category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
O GOD, MOST HIGH AND GLORIOUS,

It encourages me so much to think about Your infinite peace.
My life is full of stress and struggle, but You are forever perfectly calm.
Your plans never cause You to fear or worry that they won't work out; they are as solid as mountains.
Your power has no limits, and Your goodness never runs out.
You bring order out of chaos, and my failures are somehow Your victories.
The Lord God Almighty reigns.

I come to You as a sinner with all my worries and sorrows,
to leave every concern completely with You,
knowing every sin needs the covering of Christ's precious blood.

Revive a deep spiritual life in my heart.
Let me live close to the Great Shepherd,
to hear His voice, know what it sounds like, and follow where He calls.
Keep me from being deceived by helping me to live in the truth.
Keep me from harm by helping me to walk in the power of the Spirit.

Give me a more intense faith in what is eternally true.
Burn the things I know in my head deep into my heart through experience.
Let me never be ashamed of the truth of the gospel,
so that I can handle the criticism that comes with it,
stand up for it,
see Jesus as its very center,
and know the power of the Spirit in it.

Lord, help me, because I am often lukewarm and cold.
Unbelief messes with my confidence, and sin makes me forget You.
Cut out the weeds growing in my soul at their roots.
Help me to know that I'm only truly living when I'm living for You,
and that everything else is insignificant.

Your presence alone can make me holy, devout, strong, and happy.
Live in me, gracious God.
